system.description: Automatically equipped in each empty hand slot.

summary.value: A Silent strike, a fatal blow, an assassin's work is never slow.

system.description:
ALSO: Secret Agent, Shinobi

  • How are your targets chosen? Do you pick them yourself, or does somebody else do it?

  • Are you a freelancer, or part of an organization? Do you still work for them?

  • One of your previous marks changed you. How, and what happened?

  • Are you currently on a mission? Do you feel apprehensive about it for some reason?

ASSASSIN FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Inventory Points by 2.

PREDATOR SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.XutTT5ibA0IWX2kl]{Assassinate} (SL5)

You may spend an action and up to【SL x 5】MP (minimum 5 MP) to perform a free attack using a Brawling, Dagger, or Thrown weapon against a single creature, gaining a +1 to its Accuracy Check for every 5 MP spent this way. This attack cannot gain multi, and loses if it has it.

If you beat your target’s Defense by 5 or more, trigger an Assassination: Your attack ignores Affinities and multiplies its damage by x2, or to x3 if your target was Vulnerable to it in the first place.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.9u8jqkiI27YicLMQ]{Hide In Plain Sight} (SL3)

You may spend an action to perform an open check【DEX + INS】. Until the end of your next turn, you cannot be seen or targetted by any creature whose【INS】die is lower than the result of your check. You may exempt allies from this effect.

All contested or open checks closely related to hiding or sneaking (including this one) get a【+SL】bonus.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.LwLkkw4xZcv8ML2V]{Sneak Attack}

During your first turn of a conflict; or when one of your actions includes among its targets at least one creature that cannot see you, gain a【+SL】bonus to your Accuracy and Magic Checks.

Additionally, gain a【+SL】bonus to Initiative checks.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.Bm5kX0HJR6mL6SEf]{Master Of Disguise}

If you have some time to prepare and are out of sight, you may spend 1 Fabula Point to fully adopt a new persona. Write it down: You may change into that persona at any time as long as you’re out of sight of those you wish to trick.

Your disguise is practically perfect and can withstand the scrutiny of any Soldier-ranked foe until you blow your cover.

Elites, Champions, and Villains may be able to see through your disguise, but only Villains get to permanently invalidate it by spending an Ultima Point.

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-skills.Item.oNBIVnORM0mB9R3m]{Poissonnier} (SL3)

As an action, you may spend 2 IP and choose any number of weapons you are holding: Until the end of the scene, you increase their damage by 【SL】 and switch their damage to Poison.

All Open Checks related to identifying, combating, and using poisons gain a 【+SL】 bonus.

HEROIC SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.QBfG2V41hmsjeEgY]{Dual-Bladed Assassination}

@UUID[Compendium.fabula-ultima-homebrew.homebrew-heroic-skills.Item.Xb84whBJgufzR9Id]{Deadly Rush}

CREDIT

Class Design, Writing and Development Nitro

Layout by Ophan, based on the official Fabula Ultima layout by Emanuele Galletto

summary.value: Flee to the other end of the world; my arrow shall find you.

system.description:
ALSO: Archer, Gunslinger, Sniper

A majority of Sharpshooters are exceptionally good at dealing with threats from a carefully calculated distance; others are brave, skilled or reckless enough to engage their foes at point-blank. While many of these skilled snipers are battle-hardened soldiers, some have turned to a life of piracy, bounty hunting or banditry. A few have put their abilities at the service of the people, or use them to protect a sacred or forbidden site from intruders.

SHARPSHOOTER FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Hit Points by 5.
  • Gain the ability to equip martial ranged weapons and martial shields.

SHARPSHOOTER SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.lCFQMCY4AmDsv6sv]{Barrage} (SL5)

When you perform a ranged attack, you may spend 10 Mind Points to choose one option: the attack gains multi (2); or you increase the attack’s multi property by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.sIkQa2NzkqsvczBr]{Crossfire} (SL3)

After a creature you can see performs a ranged attack, you may spend an amount of Mind Points equal to the total Result of their Accuracy Check in order to have the attack fail automatically against all targets. You can only use this Skill if you have a ranged weapon equipped, and it has no effect if the Accuracy Check was a critical success.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.hmDCgX5OEk5l4uXW]{Hawkeye} (SL5)

When you perform the Guard action, if you choose not to provide cover to another creature, you may choose one option: the next ranged attack you perform before the end of the current scene will deal 【SL × 2】 extra damage; or you may immediately perform a free attack with a bow or firearm you have equipped, treating your High Roll (HR) as 0 when calculating damage dealt by this attack.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.0UxTgrag7cE4M1oc]{Ranged Weapon Mastery} (SL4)

You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with ranged weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Ovmw7cMrN6qvagG4]{Warning Shot} (SL4)

When you hit one or more targets with a ranged attack that would deal damage, you may have the attack deal no damage. If you do, choose one option: inflict shaken on each target hit by the attack; or inflict slow on each target hit by the attack; or each target hit by the attack loses 【SL × 10】 Mind Points. Describe your maneuver!

summary.value: The cold between the stars... it does not frighten me.

system.description:
ALSO: Astromancer, Chaos Mage, Gambler

High above the stars, where their lights do not shine, lies a bottomless void where life and souls wither and transform in unfathomable ways. This realm is a non-reality, an endless expanse of chaos impervious to the laws of time, space, and probability. Entropists refer to this realm as the Cosmos, the Heavens, or quite simply as Lady Luck: they are among the few gifted with the ability to channel its reality-bending energies.

ENTROPIST FREE BENEFITS
  • Permanently increase your maximum Mind Points by 5.
  • You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Ritualism discipline.

ENTROPIST SKILLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.jgGLuOvN8xCSQWLK]{Absorb MP} (SL5)

After you suffer damage, you may immediately recover 【SL × 2】 Mind Points.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.vtmxLTltA4JvXFXu]{Entropic Magic} (SL10)

Each time you acquire this Skill, learn one Entropist spell (see @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.Item.W9ZYH88gvlcg7atp]{[Entropist Spells]}). Offensive ( @ICON[offensive] ) Entropist spells use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.HgxY0x6jUjS6ppBc]{Lucky Seven}

You have a lucky number; at the beginning of each session, that number is 7. Once per scene after you perform a Check, you may replace the value shown on one of the dice you rolled with your lucky number (even if this would give an impossible Result, such as a value of 7 on a d6). If you do, the replaced value becomes your new lucky number.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.Ko2QCUw6qbxhufwE]{Ritual Entropism}

You may perform Rituals whose effects fall within the Entropism discipline. Entropism Rituals use 【INS + WLP】 for the Magic Check.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.84JARbmkQ5r0j39r]{Stolen Time} (SL4)

During a conflict, you may use an action to interfere with the flow of time by spending up to 【SL × 5】 Mind Points. For every 5 Mind Points you spend this way, choose one option: one creature you can see suffers slow; or one creature you can see recovers from slow; or one creature you can see may immediately perform the Equipment action for free; or choose one ally you can see who has yet to take a turn during this round: that ally may take their turn immediately after yours during this round. Each option can only be chosen once per use of this Skill.

ENTROPIST SPELLS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.spells.Item.W9ZYH88gvlcg7atp]{[Entropist Spells]}

You may spend an action and up to 【SL x 5】 MP (minimum 5 MP) to perform a free attack using a Brawling, Dagger, or Thrown weapon against a single creature, gaining a +1 to its Accuracy Check for every 5 MP spent this way. This attack cannot gain multi, and loses if it has it.

If you beat your target’s Defense by 5 or more, trigger an Assassination: Your attack ignores Affinities and multiplies its damage by x2, or to x3 if your target was Vulnerable to it in the first place.
When you perform a ranged attack, you may spend 10 Mind Points to choose one option: the attack gains multi (2); or you increase the attack's multi property by one, up to a maximum of multi (3).

You have a lucky number; at the beginning of each session, that number is 7. Once per scene after you perform a Check, you may replace the value shown on one of the dice you rolled with your lucky number (even if this would give an impossible Result, such as a value of 7 on a d6). If you do, the replaced value becomes your new lucky number.
You gain a bonus equal to 【SL】 to all Accuracy Checks with ranged weapons.

effects.name: Ranged Weapon Mastery
effects.description: You gain a bonus equal to【SL】to all Accuracy Checks with ranged weapons.

summary.value: One creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (10 Air, 10 Bolt, 10 Earth, 10 Fire, or 10 Ice).

system.description:
For 2 Inventory Points, one creature suffers 10 damage of a type of your choice (air, bolt, earth, fire, or ice).

  • Target Suffers: @DMG[10 air], @DMG[10 bolt], @DMG[10 earth], @DMG[10 fire], or @DMG[10 ice]

summary.value: This allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.

system.description: For 4 Inventory Points, this allows the entire group to rest in the wilderness and at sea.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 hp].

summary.value: One creature recovers from a single status effect.

system.description: For 2 Inventory Points, one creature recovers from a single status effect.
For 3 Inventory Points, one creature recovers @HEAL[50 mp].
